description: Discover healthier garlic bread with this recipe. Crusty wholemeal sourdough is topped with a roasted garlic spread and parsley for the ideal side to pizza or pasta.
name: Healthier Garlic Bread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat grill on high. Arrange bread, in a single layer, on tray. Grill for 2 minutes or until golden. Spread garlic mixture over bread. Scatter over extra parsley, season with pepper and serve with Healthier chicken & veggie pizzas.

Preheat grill on high. Arrange bread, in a single layer, on tray. Grill for 2 minutes or until golden. Spread garlic mixture over bread. Scatter over extra parsley, season with pepper and serve with Healthier chicken & veggie pizzas.
